product_name: The North Face Adalee Insulated Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Adalee insulated jacket delivers reliable insulation, waterproof protection and breathability to girls who play hard in the snow. Waterproof and breathable HyVent(R) technology uses a two-layer polyurethane coating for waterproof protection and durability. Fully sealed seams prevent leaks; nylon taffeta lining wicks moisture and eases layering. Heatseeker(TM) Aero insulation provides plenty of warmth at a light weight. Media pocket with cord routing keeps her tuned to her favorite beats. Fixed hood; zippered handwarmer pockets; internal media pocket with cord port; key clip; gloves clip; goggles cloth. The North Face Adalee insulated jacket features a drawcord at the hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to seal out the elements and help retain warmth.
short_description: The North Face Adalee insulated jacket delivers reliable insulation, waterproof protection and breathability to girls who play hard in the snow.
subcategory: Skiwear And Snowboard -- Boys And Girls
